heading: HR01821
0: A RESOLUTION URGING PRESIDENT RODRIGO DUTERTE TO FILE A DIPLOMATIC PROTEST AGAINST CHINA REGARDING THE PRESENCE OF THEIR MILITARY PLANES IN OUR TERRITORY AND UPHOLD THE COUNTRY'S SOVEREIGNTY OVER OUR TERRITORY

FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION URGING PRESIDENT RODRIGO DUTERTE TO FILE A DIPLOMATIC PROTEST AGAINST CHINA REGARDING THE PRESENCE OF THEIR MILITARY PLANES IN OUR TERRITORY AND UPHOLD THE COUNTRY'S SOVEREIGNTY OVER OUR TERRITORY
